full_summary:
# Casual Parachute Training
## Formation occasionnelle de parachutisme

### Tender Details

* Reference number: WS4220140086-Doc4320442690
* Amendment number: 2
* Solicitation number: WS4220140086
* Publication date: 2024-03-07
* Tender closing date: 2024-04-26T14:00:00 (do not submit bids after this time)
* Amendment date: 2024-04-18

### Tender Description

The Department of National Defence (DND) has a requirement for Casual Parachute Training. The aim of this training is to enable Canadian Armed Forces (CAF) personnel to practice and maintain the necessary skills to conduct parachute operations. This solicitation is intended to result in the award of one (1) Standing Offer (SO) for a period of three years, with the option to extend the contract by two additional one year periods.

There is no security requirement applicable to the Standing Offer. The Canadian Content does not apply as this solicitation is subject to the International Trade Agreements. The Phased Bid Compliance Process (PBCP) applies to this requirement.

### Awarding Agency

* Contracting entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* Contracting entity address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5
* End user entity: Department of National Defence (DND)
* End user entity address: 101 Colonel By Dr, Ottawa, Ontario K1A 0K2

### Contact Information

Please submit your bid package and supporting documentation to:

Melanie Duff
Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
[ melanie.duff@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca ](mailto:melanie.duff@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
